title: Budget 2024 unlikely to announce FAME III scheme, says HD Kumaraswamy
description: Budget expectations: The third phase of the FAME scheme for electric vehicles is nearing completion, but it won't be included in the upcoming Union Budget. The preparatory work is based on recommendations from various ministries, signaling a continued focus on green mobility. Industry stakeholders eagerly anticipate the new phase's implementation for further promoting electric and hybrid vehicles in India.
